sections.heading: PUBLISHED MATERIAL
text: The following additional background information from TIPSTER Text Phases I and II can be purchased from the sources indicated.
Proceedings of the Fourth Text REtrieval Conference (TREC-4).
The Proceedings are available (as they are received) at.

sections.heading: TIPSTER Text Phase I Data Extraction Collection
text: This information includes Template Definitions and Fill Rules for Joint Ventures (IV) for both English and Japanese, and is available by FTP from NMSU/CRL.

sections.heading: TIPSTER Text Phase I Document Detection Collection
text: This is the full TIPSTER Text collection used in TREC evaluations and for Document Detection.
It is available for purchase in electronic form from the Linguistic Data Consortium (LDC).
